resources.string: Reach out to us directly via email, message, or call for any inquiries or assistance you may need.
Browse reported facility issues with current statuses and summarized information for quick review.
Only authorized users can create accounts with this role. Kindly enter the valid authorization code to continue.
Are you sure you want to save this information? This action cannot be undone
Insure all information is accurate before proceeding
Thoroughly review all details. Upon confirmation, submit the task for assessment and action by the maintenance staff.
Please select the specific laboratory to which you would like to submit your concern.
Please provide a clear and concise title that accurately describes the issue to facilitate efficient processing and resolution.
Please verify your full name as it appears in your registration records to ensure accurate task tracking.
Take a clear photo of the task or facility issue that requires attention. Ensure the image accurately represents the problem.
Verify the system-generated information. Make sure everything is correct before proceeding.
Double-check all provided details. Once confirmed, submit the task for review and processing by the maintenance staff.
Please provide a detailed description of the problem to help the maintenance staff address it efficiently.

16 facility issues detected. Please review them in the Issues tab.
Click a facility to view its information, reports, and more.
Foster better communication between students, staff, and maintenance teams for effective problem-solving.
Stay informed with instant updates on the status of maintenance requests and reported concerns.
Simplify how facility issues are reported, ensuring faster acknowledgment and quicker resolutions.
Use technology to monitor facility conditions more effectively, reducing overlooked issues.
Ensure that only authorized users can report and view facility concerns, protecting data and privacy.
Utilize reports and analytics to identify recurring issues and prioritize maintenance tasks efficiently.
Welcome! What would you like to do?
New to the app? Register now
Want to change role? Click here
Don\'t have an account? Register now!
Ensure classroom facilities remain functional and safe.
Track and resolve reported facility issues quickly.
By tapping Next, you are agreeing to SMART\'s Terms and Conditions and are acknowledging our Privacy Notice applies.

1.1 By using, visiting, accessing, and/or registering with the app (including all content available through the app), you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.


1.2 We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting in the app.


1.3 These Terms apply to all users of the app, including maintenance staff, students, and admin/teachers.
2. Access and Use of this App

2.1 We grant you permission to use the app in accordance with these Terms, provided that: (a) it is for your designated role use only (Maintenance Staff, Student, Admin/Teacher), (b) you will not copy or redistribute content without permission, © you will not modify the app beyond its intended use, and (d) you comply with these Terms.

3.1 You must use the app legally and follow all applicable laws.


3.2 Do not upload or transmit harmful code such as viruses or malware.


3.3 Do not post or share inappropriate content, including offensive or unlawful material.


3.4 Do not engage in any activity that disrupts or harms the functionality of the app.


3.5 Do not gather personal information from others or use the app for commercial solicitation.


3.6 Do not infringe upon the rights of others, including intellectual property rights.


3.7 Any disputes arising between users must be handled independently. If inappropriate content is reported, we may take necessary action including content removal or user suspension.


3.8 All intellectual property within the app belongs to us and our licensors. You may not infringe these rights.
4.1 We may include links to external resources. We are not responsible for their availability, content, or any issues resulting from their use.

5.1 We comply with applicable data protection laws.


5.2 We may disclose personal information if legally required to do so or if requested by authorized parties.


5.3 We may report to authorities if illegal activity is suspected.


5.4 If you opt in, we may share your information with partner organizations for legitimate purposes.


5.5 We may store and use your data for internal app functionality, including secure access to protected areas.
